content.question: The ruling described in the excerpt is most similar to other civil rights achievements in the 1960s in that it

choices.label: reflected feminist demands for changes within the Civil Rights movement
represented responses by the federal government to calls for the expansion of civil rights
represented debates among civil rights activists over the best strategies to pursue
reflected the adoption of violent protest tactics among civil rights activists in the 1960s

content.answer: represented responses by the federal government to calls for the expansion of civil rights

topic.text: 8.10: The African American Civil Rights Movement (1960s)

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
